title: ATUK22
author: ATUK22
content: Hi EveryoneI have a NVT coin on MEXC but I want to withdrawn it, how do you withdrawn this token off MEXC because they use the network called nuls, what do I do?Thank youAndrew

comments.author: dwminer1
comments.body: Quote from: ATUK22 on February 01, 2023, 03:06:31 PMHi EveryoneI have a NVT coin on MEXC but I want to withdrawn it, how do you withdrawn this token off MEXC because they use the network called nuls, what do I do?Thank youAndrewI'm not familiar with the Nuls network, but I think you can find all the information about their project on this page: https://nuls.io/In the "ecosystem" tab you have different wallets or bridges: https://nuls.io/ecosystem/There is also a link to the wallet on the Nerve Network github: https://github.com/NerveNetwork/nerve

comments.author: TastyChillySauce00
comments.body: Quote from: ATUK22 on February 01, 2023, 03:06:31 PMI have a NVT coin on MEXC but I want to withdrawn it, how do you withdrawn this token off MEXC because they use the network called nuls, what do I do?That means you can only send or withdraw your NVT through nuls network. MEXC was only supporting NVT tokens that used nuls network. You can even use this scan to know more about that. https://nulscan.io/That being said that if MEXC didn't support NVT withdraw for another network like . it's only supporting NVT based on nuls network. It's NRC20 token. Nerve has its own chain but it seems like that nerve developers didn't request MEXC to add its own chain and prefer to use NRC20 token build on nuls network to issue NVT asset based on the different blockchain called nuls blockchain.
